member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE
member.summary: Defines the set of possible general window (app view) size preferences. Used by and .

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_DEFAULT
member.summary: The app does not specify a window size preference. Windows, rather than the app, sets the size preference, which defaults to AVSP_USE_HALF.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_USE_LESS
member.summary: Prefers to use less than 50% of the available horizontal screen pixels.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_USE_HALF
member.summary: Prefers to use 50% (half) of the available horizontal screen pixels.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_USE_MORE
member.summary: Prefers to use more than 50% of the available horizontal screen pixels.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_USE_MINIMUM
member.summary: Prefers to use the minimum horizontal pixel width (either 320 or 500 pixels) specified in the app's manifest.

member.name: APPLICATION_VIEW_SIZE_PREFERENCE.AVSP_USE_NONE
member.summary: The window has no visible component.
